name: Troll Bestowal
description:
Gameplay video: https://youtu.be/iGYEexs2wZk

Every seven years, warring ogre factions send their best "wizards" to bestow the cute forest trolls upon their foes.

A 2 player game where each player takes control of a wizard and harnesses the power elements to launch the troll bubble at their foe. Cast waves of earth, black holes, gusts of wind, and bolts of lightning in this comical elemental showdown!

NOTE: Highly recommended to use 2 xbox or playstation controllers. Keyboard controls are in as a backup.

Updates: Improved gamepad controls and added a bouncy ceiling.
